Class OnGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • Renderable
      • ImageBox
        • OnGrid
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cell, Entity

    public class OnGrid
extends ImageBox
    This class represents anything that is on the map's grid and can hence be stepped on.
    Version:
    1.6
    Author:
    Josiah Richards

    • Method Detail

      • stepOn

        public void stepOn(Moving steppedOnBy,
                   Direction movedDir)
        Steps on this object to cause a reaction. The default behaviour is to do nothing in reaction.
        Parameters:
        steppedOnBy - The moving object that stepped on this object.
        movedDir - The direction the moving object moved to step on this.

      • getGridCoords

        public Vector2 getGridCoords()
        Gets the current grid coordinates of this object.
        Returns:
        The current gridCoords of this object.

      • getMetaInfo

        public java.lang.String getMetaInfo()
        Gets the meta info, if any, that should be saved to file for this object.
        Returns:
        The string line of meta info for this object, null if there is none.
